description: Track Phase 3.5 E session artifact verification compliance per wq-215. Phase 3.5 added in R#153 (s940). Monitoring E sessions s943+ range.
success_criteria: 100% compliance (all sessions pass artifact check) after 5 E sessions

sessions.notes: A#47: files=[(none)] in session-history.txt. Phase 3.5 gate added in R#153 (s940) but s943 still produced no artifacts. Gate not enforcing.

audit_instructions.how_to_check: For each E session in s943-973 range, grep session log for 'Artifact verification s'. If found and all boxes checked [ ] â†’ [x], record passed_artifact_check=true. If boxes unchecked or returned to Phase 3, record returned_to_phase3=true.
audit_instructions.artifact_pattern:
Artifact verification s[N]:
- [x] engagement-trace.json: Entry for this session exists
- [x] engagement-intel.json: Array has entries OR documented "nothing actionable"
- [x] ctxly_remember: Called this session OR documented skip reason

what_to_record.passed_artifact_check: true if all 3 artifact boxes checked
what_to_record.returned_to_phase3: true if session had to go back to complete artifacts
what_to_record.skipped_gate: true if Phase 4 started without Phase 3.5 verification

audit_instructions.when_to_close: After 5 E sessions tracked (or when s973 reached), compute compliance_rate. If 100%, mark wq-215 done. If <100%, escalate to R session for SESSION_ENGAGE.md revision.

notes: Sessions before s943 (E#54) are pre-Phase 3.5. A sessions should populate this during normal audit cycle. First tracked session will be the next E session after s940.
